channel.title: What happened to the 'Apprehension' chapter title?
channel.description:
Wondering if anyone else has noticed that the chapter title 'Apprehension' which is supposed to display when the player enters map bm_c2a3a seems to be absent now. I seem to recall it always popped up while the player was in transit on the runaway freight tram at the very start of the level. I'm sure this was in the 2012 version, but cannot recall if it was ever present in the 2015 release, or if it somehow got lost in a recent update... or am I just crazy and did the title get moved to a different part of the game and I'm simply not noticing it?
Apologies if this has been reported already.

item.title: What happened to the 'Apprehension' chapter title?
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Can confirm. I just got to this part of the game last night, and I thought perhaps the title had been moved. But I didn’t see another title until Residue Processing.

Read full topic
item.source: What happened to the 'Apprehension' chapter title?

item.title: What happened to the 'Apprehension' chapter title?
item.dc:creator: Agent6
item.description:
Yep, it’s missing. Finished the chapter the last weekend and the title does not appear anywhere.

Read full topic

I’ve been questioning this as well. The Lambda Core title is fixed in the Steam release, but Apprehension title no longer displays.
